newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: INSTANT VIEW - Telecel could hit 12,000 esc.
newsitem.headline: INSTANT VIEW - Telecel could hit 12,000 esc.

text.p: The following is analysts' reaction to the surge in the price of Telecel-Comunicacoes Pessoais, the Portuguese mobile phone company, to record highs on Wednesday. The stock was up 9.6 percent at 11,601 escudos.

"In the short term, the shares could hit 12,000 escudos, or even go beyond, because I think when we get figures for the number of subscribers at the end of January it is going to be higher than had been forecast."
"The level of (market) penetration should be above the six percent predicted, given the aggressive marketing."
JOSE CARLOS TOMAS, BANCO PORTUGUES DE INVESTIMENTO

"This prices is discounting a very optimistic outlook for the level of penetration over the long term. It is also discounting...a very high income level per user. It is unthinkable that with current prices, the rate of penetration can be sustained. So the price is high because it is discounting some very optimistic scenarios."
